content.raw:
it seems like there's something flaky about the `gz` tool used in the `INTEGRATION_worlds_installed` test on homebrew; in [this build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1351/), it fails with different worlds each time:

first time: just one failure while checking `timer_gui.world`:

~~~
...
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/timer_gui.world
491: sh: line 1: 93529 Segmentation fault: 11  gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/timer_gui.world 2>&1
491: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/test/integration/worlds_installed.cc:74: Failure
491: Value of: success
491:   Actual: false
491: Expected: true
491: result: 
491: World file ["/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/timer_gui.world"] is going to be installed but it's not SDF compliant.
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/torsional_friction_demo.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/touch_plugin_demo.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/transporter.world
...
~~~

second time: two failures when checking 

~~~
...
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/cafe.world
491: sh: line 1: 78999 Segmentation fault: 11  gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/cafe.world 2>&1
491: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/test/integration/worlds_installed.cc:74: Failure
491: Value of: success
491:   Actual: false
491: Expected: true
491: result: 
491: World file ["/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/cafe.world"] is going to be installed but it's not SDF compliant.
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/camera.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/cart_demo.world
...
~~~

~~~
...
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plane_demo.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plane_propeller_demo.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plot3d.world
491: sh: line 1: 79096 Segmentation fault: 11  gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plot3d.world 2>&1
491: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/test/integration/worlds_installed.cc:74: Failure
491: Value of: success
491:   Actual: false
491: Expected: true
491: result: 
491: World file ["/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plot3d.world"] is going to be installed but it's not SDF compliant.
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/plugin.world
491: gz sdf --check /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/gazebo9/worlds/polyline.world
...
~~~
